version_description: - Bug fixes

- Fix bugs that Dropbox sometimes display an unknown dialog
- Add digital zoom setting in apps Configurations
- Bug fixes
Fix bugs

- Fix 2-ways audio bugs
- Bug fixes.

- Added Apple Watch app.
- Supports some HKIVision models.
- Fix some bugs...
- Fix database issue.

- Added Apple Watch app.
- Added iCloud synchronization, you will never lose your camera again.
- Fix bugs & add support tp some HKIVision, QNAP, Trendnet, Amcrest... models.
- Many other bug fixes...

- Fix some bugs
- Added new drivers
Bug fix & more driver

- Added some new models
- Fix some bugs
- Database update & fix some bugs

- Supports iPhone X
- More drivers
- Fix bugs
Fix bugs
Fix some bugs...
Fix bugs...

+++ New feature: Camera group. Now you can view your pre-defined group of cameras easily with just 2 taps. Please enjoy it.
- New models has been added.
- Fix some bugs...

- Fix some Dropbox problems
- Fix some French translations
- Add new models & fix some bugs...

- Fix clone camera does not copy the public ip address/url & port.
- Automatically changing between local & public ip address/url now works with Streaming cameras, too!
- Minor bugs fixed.

- Fix some Panasonic cameras.
- Fix 'Save to Photos' issue.

- Fix Dropbox crashing on iPad.
- Fix device crashing when at start when connecting many streaming cameras at a same time.
- Fix camera control not working.
- Some minor bug fixes.
- Fix controlling model issue for generic url type.

- Supports Onvif cameras, you can also scan for Onvif cameras in your local network.
- Added some new drivers
- Fix bugs

- German language improvements (thanks to Stefan Grasekamp).
- Fix critical bug that cause the app crashing when viewing too many streaming cameras at the same time.
- Some minor bug fixes.

- Fix an issue which cause the app to crash when viewing too many streaming cameras at the same time.
- Fix the digest authentication problem when connecting to some rtsp server.
- Add some new dirvers.
- Minor bug fixes.
Minor bugs fixed

New lock screen
Some localization fixes
Search for Brand & Model name in Brand list
Editing fields which are required now with red star sign
Flip upside down & Mirror camera feed options

- iOS 13 support.
- Fixes audio problem on some model.
- Many minor bugs fixed.

- Fix appearance bug on older iOS
- Fix some rare case the camera won't connect if there is special charater in username or password.

- Fix crashes when open the app with multiple streaming camera.
- Fix camera's control button appearance while system's dark mode is actived.
- Fix camera's image rotation (mirrored/flip) may not working as expected in some cases.

- Fix some bugs.
- Improved onvif feature.
- Fix bugs for Scan camera
Fix connecting bug.
Fix some bugs
Fix connection error
Fix connection error

- Fix audio bugs
- Fix record with audio feature
- Fix interface bugs on watchOS
